Package modules.control

Class ListMovieController

  • java.lang.Object
    • modules.control.BaseController
      • modules.control.ListMovieController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WithAdminEnter
    public class ListMovieController
extends BaseController
implements WithAdminEnter
    Represents a type of controller that is able to list out movie names in consoleUI

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Movie> movieList
      This is the whole list of movies loaded from the database;
      private int sortOption
      This is the sort option of the movie list 1 for sort by ticket sales and 2 for sort by user rating; 0 for no sorting requirement

      • ListMovieController

        public ListMovieController​(ConsoleUI inheritedConsoleUI,
                           int sortOption)
        This is to instantiate a controller with sorting requirement
        Parameters:
        inheritedConsoleUI - the ConsoleUI instance passed down from the previous controller
        sortOption - 1 for sort by ticket sales and 2 for sort by user rating; 0 for no sorting requirement

      • enter

        public void enter​(java.lang.Boolean isAdmin)
        This is to enter a series of process to display the movie list and let user to choose.
        Specified by:
        enter in interface WithAdminEnter
        Parameters:

      • constructLogMenu

        private java.util.ArrayList constructLogMenu​(java.util.ArrayList<Movie> movieList,
                                             int sortOption)
        This is to display all movies by order if required and return the re-sorted movie list
        Parameters:
        movieList - The whole list of movies
        sortOption - 1 for sort by ticket sales and 2 for sort by user rating; 0 for no sorting requirement
        Returns:
        the re-sorted movie list by sortOption
